location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch of the East Saudi Arabian Coast

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; black ink and pencil on paperDimensions: 212 x 175mm

mods.abstract: Sketch in pencil and black ink depicting the eastern part of the Arabian Peninsula as well as the Persian Gulf. Marked in ink are the following: the Hasa [Al Hasa] region of eastern Saudi Arabia, R Tanurah [Ras Tanura], Jebel Dhahran [Jabal Z̧ahrān], Bahrein [Bahrain] and Katr [Qatar]. Elsewhere in the file the map is attributed to Percy Gordon Loch, Acting Political Resident in the Persian Gulf.
